mapper.insert: insert into product_info( product_image_url, product_name, product_price, product_price_unit, product_cost, product_cost_unit, product_discount, product_first_category, product_second_category, product_selling )values( #{product_image_url}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_price_unit}, #{product_cost}, #{product_cost_unit}, #{product_discount}, #{product_first_category}, #{product_second_category}, #{product_selling} )
